events.name: Oregon Ducks at TCU Horned Frogs

headlines.description: Bram Kohlhausen's 8-yard touchdown run in the third overtime carried TCU to a wild victory over Oregon as the Horned Frogs stormed back from a 31-0 deficit on Saturday in the Valero Alamo Bowl.
headlines.shortLinkText: Down 31, TCU rallies for 3OT win in Alamo Bowl

events.name: Penn State Nittany Lions at Georgia Bulldogs

headlines.description: Terry Godwin threw a touchdown pass on a trick play and caught one later, helping Georgia beat Penn State 24-17 in the TaxSlayer Bowl on Saturday.

video.headline: Georgia survives late scare from Penn State

headlines.shortLinkText: Georgia beats Penn State 24-17 in TaxSlayer for 5th straight

events.name: Kansas State Wildcats at Arkansas Razorbacks

headlines.description: Alex Collins ran for 185 yards and three touchdowns and Arkansas capped its late-season surge with a 45-23 victory over Kansas State on Saturday in the AutoZone Liberty Bowl.

video.headline: Collins, Arkansas cruises at Liberty Bowl

headlines.shortLinkText: Arkansas motors past Kansas State 45-23 in Liberty Bowl

events.name: West Virginia Mountaineers at Arizona State Sun Devils

headlines.description: Skyler Howard threw for a Cactus Bowl-record 532 yards and hit David Sills on a 15-yard pass for his fifth touchdown with 2:19 left, lifting West Virginia to a wild 43-42 win over Arizona State e
headlines.shortLinkText: West Virginia beats Arizona State 43-42 in Cactus Bowl
